body:
Hi hello I'm Darklight55z, I used to play this server a whilee ago for a little bit. Then recently after some searching around found it again!

You may have seen me around as I've been playing a fair bit now since I've found it. xD

Also, I used to moderate for a couple large servers in the past, if you happen to recognize me from elsewhere that may be why. I usually go unnoticed though, I'm kinda a ninja like that, hehe.

Anyways, just wanted to post here because why not, I've been enjoying the server!

One we've had for 10-11 years now, his name's Boogie!

I really want to say two, but we haven't seen Nemo for months now. We had him for 13-14 or so years. :c
